{{ featuredProject.name }}

{{ featuredExpanded ? featuredProject.description : (featuredProject.description | slice: 0:250) + '...' }}

{{ project.name }}

{{ project.expanded ? project.description : (project.description | slice: 0:180) + '...' }}

{{ tech }}
Visit
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredExpanded = false; featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Management System", description: `A modern HRMS solution built for enterprise automation â€” integrating attendance, payroll, leave, and performance management within a unified workflow. It supports real-time data synchronization across modules, dynamic leave policies, payroll computation rules, and detailed analytics dashboards. Designed with Angular, PHP, and MySQL for scalability and responsiveness.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], image: "assets/projects/hrms.jpg", link: "#" }; projects = [ { name: "UbiCRM â€” Customer Relationship Management", description: `A CRM platform for managing leads, deals, and client interactions with automation, analytics, and real-time insights.`, techStack: ["Angular 17", "AdonisJS", "MySQL", "Highcharts.js"], image: "assets/projects/crm.jpg", link: "#", expanded: false }, { name: "Organization Management System", description: `A scalable platform for onboarding, subscription tracking, and approval workflows serving 3000+ organizations, improving efficiency and automating renewals.`, techStack: ["AngularJS", "PHP (CodeIgniter)", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/organization.jpg", link: "#", expanded: false }, { name: "Payroll Penalty Automation System", description: `Automated rule-based payroll deduction engine linked with attendance logs â€” reducing HR dependency and increasing accuracy by 70%.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/payroll.jpg", link: "#", expanded: false }, { name: "Automatic Email & Notification System", description: `Real-time communication system for sending event-triggered notifications and approval alerts to employees.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/notifications.jpg", link: "#", expanded: false } ]; toggleExpand(project: any) { project.expanded = !project.expanded; } }
